EmailTemplate.subject: Article: How Do You Make Your Data Actionable?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Nearly half of U.S. banking consumers are willing to switch to an FI that can better anticipate their needs, according to an NCR survey conducted by The Harris Poll.
They want personalized experiences and proactive advice. And you have an abundance of data to make that happen.
But are you maximizing your data to provide real-time value to your users?
Read an article on The Financial Brand from NCR’s Doug Brown <[[https://thefinancialbrand.com/108653/customer-data-strategy-bank-credit-union-insights-wellness/]]>—and learn 3 ways you can make your data meaningful and actionable—beginning with breaking down internal silos. ${CTAText} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
